name: Shapegrammer
description:
Shapegrammer is a game inspired by the traditional tangram puzzle that will test your reflexes and visual-spatial ability.

Pick the correct shape and rotation to pass through the never ending obstacles. Try to get the highest score and be awesomer than your friends!

Best played with a gamepad. Keyboard controls supported.

Gamepad controls:
  • A button: start the game
  • A, B, X, Y buttons: change shape
  • Left stick: rotate shape
Keyboard controls:
  • Down arrow: start the game
  • Directional arrows: change shape
  • W, A, S, D: rotate shape
Menu controls:
  • F5: change player name (for the leaderboard)
  • F7: toggle music
  • F8: toggle sound fx
  • F10: quit game

This game is my entry for the Ludum Dare Jam 35. The theme was "shapeshift".

Post jam version

The post jam version adds a difficulty level selector. Press LB or Tab to switch between RELAX (new, easier mode) and CHALLENGE (basically the same as the original version). They have separate high scores and leaderboards.

We also increased the top scores list to 20 names. Hopefully now everybody can enjoy the game without being too frustrated, regardless of their skill level. Have fun!


Programming and graphics: Andrea Pantaloni
Music and SFX: Katalin Negretti
Additional graphics: Tommaso Pantaloni

Thanks for playing!
